title: [MAC CLIENT]Can't Change Ward Skin
body:
So, I recently got a couple of new ward skins in the new Hextech Chest Release and went to the 'Ward Skin' tab in the store to look for the section where it USUALLY gives me the option to swap. 
But, since the Hextech chest patch, every time I go back to the store looking for this option it is never there...
So now i have no way of swapping my ward skins... unless i'm just being dumb and the option to do so has been relocated...
Team help plz!!

replies.body:
Heya! 

Thanks for the report! You should have the option to change your ward skin in champion select. Is that option available to you? IIRC, we removed that option in the store, I can double check, though.

Ah I see, just as I suspected... i was just being dumb!

Thanks for pointing that out though :D
i have exactly the same problem
